name: Pac-Man Console
description:
Play Pac-Man in your windows command prompt!
Create and play your own Pac-Man levels in your windows command prompt!

A replica of the age old classic game  pac-man that runs in the windows command prompt window (windows 10). In addition to playing the game of pac-man, use the editor option from the main menu at start up to edit or create entirely new levels that are fully playable.

Watch the video to see how to play and edit your own Pac-Man levels.

This was an educational project in learning c++ to make games. Check out the git repository with all code (c++) and assets used for the game: https://github.com/uris/PacMan-Game.git. Feel free to dowload, copy, change at will.

Note: to play, you'll only need to install the pacman_consolte.ttf font. Simply open the font, and select the "install" option from the header and you're all set. The readme.txt in the zip walks you through this step.
